arcs.headline: Complete Audio Suite: Music, Transcription, and Emotional Speech
arcs.summary: A massive expansion of audio capabilities brings `elevenmusic` for track generation, `whisper` for speech-to-text, and an upgrade to ElevenLabs v3 for emotive TTS (laughing, crying). New API endpoints and permission controls make these immediately accessible.

arcs.headline: A Polished Frontend Experience
arcs.summary: The platform received a visual overhaul featuring a unified header, a redesigned authorization page matching our green theme, and native UI support for the new audio models.

arcs.headline: Meet Polly: The AI Discord Bot
arcs.summary: We launched Polly to bridge our community chat with GitHub development. On the API side, we streamlined the balance endpoint and updated the Gemini Search registry for better accuracy.

arcs.headline: Image Model Stability & Aspect Ratio Fixes
arcs.summary: Optimizations for Flux Klein, Sana, and Twinflow improve generation stability. We also fixed a bug in Klein-9B to ensure non-square aspect ratios are respected correctly.

one_liner: A massive audio update brings music generation and emotional speech, alongside a sleek frontend redesign and the launch of our Discord bot, Polly.
